parameters.name: datastoreDeleteProjectId
parameters.helpText: Project ID to delete entities from
parameters.label: Project ID

parameters.name: datastoreDeleteNamespace
parameters.helpText: Namespace to delete entities from. Leave empty for default namespace
parameters.label: Namespace

parameters.name: datastoreDeleteQuery
parameters.helpText: Query to find entities to delete, eg: SELECT __key__ FROM Kind
parameters.label: Query
